General.Name: CPR Gomu Industrial PCL
General.Description: CPR Gomu Industrial Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells natural and synthetic rubber parts and moldings for automobiles and motorcycles in Thailand. The company offers rubber bushes and seats, bushings, insul-trans holes, dust cover torsion bars, rubber X-pin/gauges, bounds, assy bounds, mudguards, seats, assy, bush upr links, and strainers. It also produces and sells metal products and metal pipes. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Wang Noi, Thailand.

2.Name: Captain Ekkamol  Gangaketu
2.Title: Deputy Managing Director, VP and Director
